title: Estate Services Team Leader Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England)
Interview Descriptions: Talent acquisition called 1st for an initial phone interview. Phone call was nice and simple and informative. They called me back for a face to face interview in the London Head Office. The interview was with 2 managers from the department who asked 10 questions follwed by a written exercise.
Interview Questions: All questions are based on experiences and examples of them from previous positions.

title: Income Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Nov 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very good. The people on the panel were nice and it didn’t feel daunting or intimidating in anyway. The process of the interview was explained before it started and they allowed time for questions afterwards. Overall it was a very nice interview that didn’t leave me feeling stressed or nervous.
Interview Questions: Tell us about your history of income collection

title: Rent & Service Charge Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Nov 2022
Interview Descriptions: I had a pleasant overall experience, from speaking with the recruitment team to discussing the vision for the role with the hiring manager. I felt wanted, especially when I was given the opportunity to come back for an interview after a brief illness kept me from the initial interview. The recruitment manager was very caring and understanding after I was offered the role and was struggling to decide between accepting the offer from Octavia or the counteroffer from my previous employer. Overall, the entirety of the interview process was pleasant and engaging.
Interview Questions: Present your vision of a high-performing service that delivers clear and accurate information to customers on rents and service charges

title: Service Development Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: A 1 hour interview on competency based questions asking how I would go about doing aspects of the role and other soft skills such as communication and time management. Time for questions at the end about working at Octavia.
Interview Questions: - What’s the external operating context and how will that impact the teams work? - How would you approach carrying out a policy review? - how do you managed your time and prioritise your work?

title: LMS Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: There had been two stages interview: the screening interview and an in person interview which included an assessment too. During the process everyone was very nice and friendly, with a very good communication from the recruiter and I had also received tips on how to prepare for the interview.
Interview Questions: Describe a situation when you had to adapt your delivery style to accommodate a diverse audience.

title: Administration Support Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: Two stage interview process; first stage assessing basic skills and second stage deeper questioning from day to day tasks to work outlook. Friendly interviews throughout and generally an enjoyable experience.
Interview Questions: How would you gather information to create a information booklet for a client?

title: Scheme Support Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: I had a Competency  based interview  over teams, with two team members. they both made me feel very comfortable and answered any questions i had.  felt like a converasation rather than a scary interview.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time when you had to deal with a difficuilt situation

title: Bank Staff Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Dec 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was friendly and straightforward .   I had an informal chat on the phone,  I submitted my CV and was given an online interview.   During  Interview I was given information about training , development and career progression within the charity.   Once the interview was complete my references were checked and I was given an offer of employment.
Interview Questions: Questions about charity shops and my experience working within the voluntary sector.

title: Care Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Dec 2021
Interview Descriptions: It went extreamly well and the manager was so welcoming , i went in and took a seat to do my interview and got asked a few questions. They weren’t difficult at all. Overall, i’d say it was great.
Interview Questions: what would you do in the situation of a client falling down the stairs?

title: Security Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Dec 2021
Interview Descriptions: Competency-based interviews in two parts. A majority of the first interview was used to test my knowledge, experience and approach to company security. The second was based around what I plan on bringing to role and what support I need to achieve it.
Interview Questions: How have I reacted to a security breach in the past?

title: Assistant Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was smooth, straightforward, and professional. I first had a telephone interview, after a video interview,  and feedback was given within 2 days. So, the whole process took about a week.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself,
What do you know about Octavia?
The differences between a charity shop and a normal shop.

title: Assistant Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions: Multi-stage interview process with management team reps, the CEO and finally the Chair showed great investment from Octavia in getting the recruitment right.   I was really impressed that they offered me a second go at the initial interview when my wifi went down, acknowledging the issues of doing recruitment via the internet.
Interview Questions: A solid range of competency-based questions with no ‘bear traps’.

title: Compliance Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Sept 2021
Interview Descriptions: First I spoke on the phone to the recruiter. After a week she notified me that I was accepted for the interview. I chose the day and time for the interview from the offers. I had the very long interview with 3 pannelists. They called me the day after the interview and offered me the job.
Interview Questions: To explain why I am appropriate for the job.

title: Assistant Director of Finance Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Sept 2021
Interview Descriptions:
The interview process was extremely professional. I got all pre interview information on time and the actual interview was conducted with decorum.

The members of the panel gave me sufficient time to provide answers which i supported with examples and they asked numerous followup questions. This made it engaging and purposeful.

At the end of the interview i was given an opportunity to ask questions and was also given information on next steps.

I also thought the interview process itself was very fair. The panel reflected the society in which we live and i valued this very much. It made it the right choice for me.
Interview Questions: How i felt working in an organisation which valued diversity and helping the needy.

title: Outreach and Befriending Link Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview was online, the questions were very relevant and job specific. There was plenty of time to ask questions.  The interviewers were very friendly and put you at ease.
Interview Questions: What your understanding of the job was.

title: Assistant Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions:
Position advertised for six days. 
Stage one of a two stage interview process scheduled with just over half a day’s notice.
In addition interviews scheduled before expiry of job advert. 
Entire process was not  in keeping with public sector best practice recruitment. Felt like a process designed to give the appearance of equal opportunity.

title: Shop Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions:
Unprofessional, untrained staff, didn’t really act confident 
Not very good at interviewing, forgot to get back to me with an interview date, I had to contact head of department to get my interview.

title: Communications Trainee Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Nov 2017
Interview Descriptions: Was a very long online application process. I was shortly contacted. The interview itself had a written email test and a panel interview which seemed quite unprepared. Contacted a while later saying they are yet to make a decision and I will be contacted. I was not contacted. Overall quite unprofessional considering the time and efforts I put into this
Interview Questions: Tell us about an event you were in control of?

title: Service Improvement Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Octavia (London, England) in Jul 2013
Interview Descriptions: Submission of CV and Covering Letter. After shorlisting traditional panel based interview and written test. The experience was very poor. Was left waiting for more than 50 minutes in the reception area. No-one explained why the delay? Eventually collected by someone who never apologised for the wait. Taken up to the fourth floor - in silence, person never attempted to make conversation. Taken into room for test and found the previous candidates work clearly visible and accessible on the laptop. Had a negative effect on me for the rest of the process.
Interview Questions: What is your project management style?
